title: FS: 1887 N172 Old Judge Hugh Duffy HOF RC PSA - SOLD!

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 N172 Old Judge Hugh Duffy HOF RC PSA - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
My apologies for the additional pictures.  Turns out I'm not as computer savvy as I thought I was!!

Gorgeous Old Judge Duffy HOF RC in a PSA AUT holder.  Trimmed, but not creases or stains, and a great image!  $525 OBO - SOLD!

Jimi
